snippet: A meeting of Moms Demand Action for Gun Sense in America was interrupted by a peaceful protest by armed members of Open Carry Texas.
abstract: Meeting of Moms Demand Action for Gun Sense in America, Texas group seeking tougher gun laws, is interrupted by a peaceful protest by heavily armed members of gun rights organization Open Carry Texas; incident is latest skirmish in intensifying battle over limits on gun culture in Texas, where open-carry gatherings have grown larger, bolder, and more problematic for police and city officials.
lead_paragraph: A meeting of Moms Demand Action for Gun Sense in America was interrupted by a peaceful protest by armed members of Open Carry Texas.

headline.main: A Face-Off Outside Dallas in the Escalating Battle Over Texas’ Gun Culture
headline.print_headline: A Face-Off Outside Dallas in the Escalating Battle Over Texas’ Gun Culture
